author: SteveL-MSFT
body: Where 2FA is required, we should make it extensible and perhaps have [Azure multi-factor](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/multi-factor-authentication/multi-factor-authentication) support by default

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: At this time, we should leverage SSH support for 2FA/MFA and work with partners like Azure to make sure their 2FA is available via SSH

title: Enable pluggable 2FA
